name: Nils Haberstroh
bio: To me programming is like a treat. And Rust :rust: is the kinder surprise. That brings something exciting, something to play with and the borrow checker.

name: Nahua Kang
bio: I am a self-taught programmer with a background in liberal arts. I work with Python professionally in the intersection between software development and deep learning. In my spare time, I also play with Go, Rust, and Swift.
